summary: REQ-2 documentation files for Draft 125 were added, but the diff also includes modifications to application/backend files despite explicit constraints requiring a clean rebuild/redeploy with no source code changes. This conflicts with REQ-1 and the stated constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a new Caffeine draft and deploy the exact same application version currently deployed (Version 125) with no changes to backend or frontend source code and no state/schema migrations.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows source code/state-related files modified (including backend/main.mo, which was explicitly prohibited). That contradicts the 'no source code edits' and 'clean rebuild/redeploy only' requirement; the diff provides no evidence of a redeploy using identical code.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly constrained not to modify backend/main.mo (and no application source changes). Any modification here is out of scope for a clean rebuild/redeploy.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to frontend-file-summaries.txt describing numerous frontend component changes (e.g., App.tsx init flow, Header branding, TrainingLog analytics, dialogs, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: The request explicitly forbids introducing new features or UI changes and requires no frontend source code edits; this modified summary file indicates changes beyond documentation-only redeploy notes.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification of project_state.json (project metadata/state description changes)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; the BuildRequest is for a clean rebuild/redeploy plus adding three Draft 125 documentation files only.
